text: Jeremy Shea (born 29 May 1987), is a retired Micronesian footballer who played as a goalkeeper. ==International career== Shea represented the Federated States of Micronesia at the 2003 Pacific Games. ==Career statistics== === International === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
